name: W Budapest
description: Beyond the urban fairytale, awaits an unmatched experience of the city dubbed the Queen of the Danube River. Bold design covers this UNESCO heritage site through 151 stylish guest rooms, including 45 suites. Blending history with modern luxury, you'll stay between ballet and beats, elegance and edge, established and avant-garde. Elevate your nights in underground bars and unlock secret doors to your most intriguing imagination. Why truth or dare when you can have both?Marriott

name: Verno House
description: Set in Budapest and with St. Stephen's Basilica reachable within 400 metres, Verno House offers concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a spa and wellness centre with a terrace, fitness centre and sauna, as well as a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Verno House provides certain units with city views, and each room includes a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at Verno House. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the hotel. Popular points of interest near Verno House include Hungarian State Opera, Dohany Street Synagogue and House of Terror. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International, 14 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel
description: Surrounded by greenery in the Buda part of Budapest, Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel is 2.5 km from the Citadel and the castle district. It features a wellness centre and free Wi-Fi in rooms. Access to the 2400 m2 wellness area is free of charge for guests. The area includes a swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, salt-, aroma-, and steam cabin. Canapé beds and deck chairs can be used in the relaxation area. Rubin Wellness & Conference Hotel houses a restaurant and a cosy bar serving snacks such as sandwiches, pastries, tea and coffee. A hot buffet breakfast is served each morning. The property is well-connected to the city centre. The next bus stop is just 100 metres away and the M1 and M7 motorways are easily accessible.

name: Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest
description: Located centrally in Budapest, Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest is minutes on foot from Deak Ferenc Ter Station and provides a swimming pool and a Finnish sauna. It offers 5-star accommodation and views of the city. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Kempinski The Spa. Facilities include free wireless internet and body treatments. Those staying at the property can also enjoy city views from the in-house gym. After a day of sightseeing in the local region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all feature a desk and an in-room safe. Guests of Corvinus Kempinski Budapest are welcome to experience Japanese cuisine at Nobu, or try local dishes at ÉS Bisztró-Brasserie. Afternoon tea is served daily at The Living Room. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Blue Fox The Bar. Hotel Corvinus Kempinski is located in the heart of Budapest’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Buda Castle is easily reached by car.Revato

name: Danubius Hotel Helia
description: The Danubius Hotel Helia can be found right on the banks of the Danube river opposite Budapest's Margaret Island and offers you great fitness, spa and conference facilities. Budapest's historic city centre can be reached within 15 minutes from the Danubius Hotel Helia. Choose from nicely furnished, non-smoking rooms, most of them overlooking the Danube river, Budapest's Margaret Island and the Buda hills. Plunge into the large pool and enjoy the breathtaking panorama from the 2-storey fitness club! There is a spacious car and bus park just outside the hotel. medical treatments, physical exercise, and medical examinations are also available at the hotel for an additional fee. The sauna is not co-ed.

name: Aquaworld Resort Budapest
description: Aquaworld Resort Budapest wellness and family friendly hotel is offering services unique in Budapest: it has 309 rooms, the main building has standard rooms, junior suites, family rooms and apartments. Free, unlimited internet access (Wi-Fi) in the entire premises of the hotel, as well as free outdoor car park for over 1000 cars await the arriving guests. The complex houses a three-leveled Oriental Spa wellness and fitness centre for those longing for relaxation, Bongo Kids Club for the youngest visitors and one of Europes grandest indoor water theme parks, Aquaworld for the adventurous. Aquaworld is directly accessible from the hotel. The water amusement park offers unforgettable entertainment for every age group all year round. The suspension bridges, towers and pools surrounding the replica of Angkor Wat temple provide a breathtaking sight. Visitors are transformed into explorers and can feel as if theyve fallen into a new world: tropical atmosphere, suspension bridges, palm trees, whirlpool, mountain stream, 17 indoor and outdoor kiddy and amusement pools. Adventure and adrenalin rush is guaranteed with 11 different slides, surf pool, diving and floating balls. A playground, childrens pools, childrens play corner and the Bongo Kids Club with supervision await our youngest guests.iHotelier/iStay

name: Anantara New York Palace Budapest
description: The 5* Anantara New York Palace Budapest Hotel is situated on Erzsébet Körút boulevard. Conveniently close to the Madach Theatre, Hungarian State Opera House and the famed Chain Bridge. The Blaha Lujza underground station is a short walk away and Budapest Airport can be reached by car in 30 minutes. The building spans seven floors filled with 185 rooms, where tea and coffee facilities, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi come as standard. A range of rooms and suites are available with sweeping views over the city. Guests can choose from the hotel’s two restaurants, the New York Café and the Salon Restaurant or a bar menu at the Nyugat Bar. The hotel’s spa and gym offer guests the chance to relax and rejuvenate away from the city.NH Hoteles

name: Lions Garden Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa area and a restaurant, the boutique-style Lion's Garden Hotel is located in Budapest, 150 metres from the City Park. The new Museum of Ethnography, the House of Hungarian Music and the Heroe Square at the end of the Andrassy Avenue are in walking distance. Keleti Railway Station and the NEW Puskás Ferenc Stadium are both within 800 metres, while the Papp László Sports Arena and Arena Plaza are within 1.5 km from the property. The hotel is located in the diplomatic quarter, close to many embassies and faces to the 100-year-old Dominican Church. The spa facilities including a swimming pool, a hot tub and a sauna, are available free of charge (different opening hours!). Massage can be booked with the property for a surcharge. On the 6th floor we offer our NEW room type; DELUXE double room with balcony and shower.

name: Ensana Grand Margaret Island
description: Built in 1873 on the lush green and quiet Margaret Island in the centre of Budapest, the Ensana Grand Margaret Island offers a spacious spa area with a selection of treatments. A heated underground corridor connects the hotel to the neighbouring Ensana Thermal Margaret Island, which features one of Europe's top health spas. A hot tub, 2 pools, and various saunas and beauty treatments can be enjoyed there. The diagnostic section features various therapeutic treatments. Guests can access the spa area free of charge. The Széchenyi Restaurant offers fine dining with magnificent views of the park. International, domestic and diet cuisine, with a wide selection of Hungary's best wines, are served. Outdoor dining can be enjoyed in summer on the terrace and in the garden. In the evenings, a gypsy orchestra provides entertainment. The classically furnished rooms overlook the Danube or the magnificent park. They are all air-conditioned and have a minibar. The island stretches over 4 km and is protected leafy botanical parkland with ancient trees, a Japanese garden, and a rose garden, an open-air amphitheatre, traversed by walking and jogging tracks. Bicycles, horses, carts and electric buggies can be hired to get around. It is only a 15-minute drive away from the centre of Budapest.

name: Walzer Hotel
description: The charming Hotel Walzer can be found surrounded by mansions and greenery on the Buda side of the Hungarian capital, within easy reach of Budapest's city centre.Wireless internet is available in the entire hotel free of charge. The castle-like, thoroughly renovated building includes a sauna, a restaurant serving tasty Hungarian and international cuisine, and a bar. Unlimited coffee and tea are included in the room rate. You can park your car for free on the site of the Walzer Hotel. Hotel Walzer is situated 8 km from the International Bus Station Népliget, 8.3 km from Syma, 9.7 km from Hungexpo and 18 km from the airport. The tram station is 20 meters from the hotel towards Széll Kálmán Tér transport hub and the Déli Train Station. The city center is 6 km from the hotel, 30 minutes by public transportation.

name: Bliss Hotel & Wellness
description: This 4-star superior hotel is located in the centre of Budapest, a 2-minute walk from Oktogon Metro Station. It features an indoor pool, a hot tub and modern rooms and apartments. The Bliss Hotel & Wellness has a wellness/fitness area with a swimming pool, sauna and a massage area. A spacious fitness centre with a personal trainer is also on site. Each accommodation unit has free access to WiFi. A flat-screen TV is also provided. The contemporary bathrooms are equipped with a hairdryer. Bliss Hotel & Wellness is close to shops, cafés and restaurants. Secured private parking is available at the hotel against a fee. Bicycles can be rented at the property for a surcharge, and free walking city tours can be organised.

name: Queen's Court Hotel & Residence
description: The Queen’s Court Hotel & Residence is ideally located in the heart of Budapest and it boasts a lavish retro-classical spa area with indoor pool and a hot tub. A quiet garden in the courtyard invites all guests to relax. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. The Queen’s Court provides spacious, individually designed suites with balconies, air conditioning and kitchenettes. Some also have a spacious living room and a dining area. The in-house Chess Restaurant & Bar serves international cuisine and fine wines. The Blaha Lujza tér M2 Metro Station is 650 metres from the property, while the Deák Ferenc tér hub, as well as the St.Stephen's Basilica can be reached within a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Silver Garden
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a seasonal outdoor pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and a picnic area.Expedia

name: Mala Garden Design Hotel
description: Designed in Bali Island-style, the 4-star superior Mala Garden Design Hotel is situated directly on the shore of Lake Balaton in Siófok. It offers a restaurant with Hungarian, Thai and vegetarian cuisine and free WiFi. The spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, an infrared sauna, a tropical shower and Thai massages. All rooms at Mala Garden Design Hotel are air-conditioned and are decorated with warm colours, hardwood floors and comfortable, large beds. The Mandara Modern Italian Kitchen offers home-made pastries, cocktails and hot dishes, as well as a lake-side terrace. Guests can rent bicycles, windsurfing and swimming in Lake Balaton or relax on the private sun terrace above the water. The hotel provides parking in a secured parking area, available on request and for a surcharge.

name: Zsanett Hotel
description: Located in Balatonkeresztúr, directly on the shore of Lake Balaton, Zsanett Hotel is set in a typical Hungarian-style building and surrounded by a large, lush garden. A sauna and an outdoor pool can be used during summer, while an outdoor fitness park is available throughout the year. Each spacious room has satellite TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available at the front terrace. You can enjoy breakfast at the property. A children’s playground can be found in the large garden. Hotel Zsanett is situated 50 metres from the public beach, and a nudist beach is a 10-minute walk away. Balatonkeresztúr Train Station can be reached within 1.6 km.

name: Hubertus Hof Landhotel
description: Surrounded by a large park, this elegant country-style hotel in Balatonfenyves is 500 metres from the southern shore of Lake Balaton. It offers a free bicycle hire and an outdoor pool. All rooms at Hubertus-Hof Hotel & Restaurant feature a minibar, a TV, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Hungarian and international gourmet cuisine, including game dishes, is served in the restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Spa facilities include a Finnish sauna, a steam bath, and massage and fitness rooms. Guests can play football and table tennis on site. For hunters, the Hubertus-Hof offers a private hunting preserve and a gun storage cabinet in every room. Secure private parking is available on site free of charge.

name: Sirius Hotelsuperior
description: Set in Keszthely, 500 metres from Keszthely Municipal Beach, Sirius Hotel****Superior offers accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 8 km from Thermal Lake Hévíz, 30 km from Sümeg Castle and 48 km from Zalaszentiván Vasútállomás. Festetics Castle is 1.9 km away and Blue Church is 7.9 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At Sirius Hotel****Superior all rooms are equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Sirius Hotel****Superior offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna, hot tub and spa centre. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include German, English and Hungarian. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Libas Beach, Helikon Beach and Balaton Museum. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 17 km from Sirius Hotel****Superior.

name: Akadémia Hotel
description: Located in Balatonfüred in the Veszprem Region, the property offers free entry to Balatonfüred Municipal Swimming Pool with access to swimming pool, sauna, hot tub and steam cabin. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a TV. Akadémia Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel also offers bike hire. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 61 km from the property.

name: Balkon Apartmanház Panzió
description: Situated in Balatonfüred in the Veszprem region and Eszterhazy Beach reachable within 1.6 km, Balkon Apartmanház Panzió features accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All units include a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an equipped kitchen, a dining area, and a private bathroom fiitted with a hair dryer, while some rooms feature a terrace or a balcony. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. The bed and breakfast offers an outdoor fireplace. There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go cycling and hiking nearby. Popular points of interest near Balkon Apartmanház Panzió include Balatonfured Kisfaludy, Balatonfüred train station and Annagora Aquapark. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton, 87 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Silver Lounge Siófok
description: Featuring a sun terrace with a swimming pool, as well as a garden, Silver Lounge Siófok is located in Siófok. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a minimarket, along with free WiFi. The accommodation provides an open-air bath, entertainment staff and family rooms. All units in the guest house are equipped with a kettle. At Silver Lounge Siófok every room is equipped with a balcony, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Silver Lounge Siófok offers an outdoor fireplace. Ujhelyi Beach is 1.4 km from the guest house, while Bebo Aquapark is 6.7 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton, 85 km from Silver Lounge Siófok, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Balaland Residence Apartmanhotel
description: Located 600 metres from Szantod Ferry, Balaland Residence Apartmanhotel Apartmanhotel offers a bar, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, lake views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with bath or shower. A private beach area is available on site. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 60 km from the accommodation.

name: Modern Apartman Deluxe
description: Situated in Alsóörs in the Veszprem region, Modern Apartman Deluxe features a patio. The accommodation is 15 km from the Tihany Abbey and has free WiFithroughout the property. The country house has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with garden views. The country house offers an outdoor fireplace. If you would like to discover the area, cycling is possible in the surroundings and Modern Apartman Deluxe can arrange a bicycle rental service. Bella Stables and Animal Park is 44 km from the accommodation, while Bebo Aquapark is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 95 km from Modern Apartman Deluxe.

name: Vadkacsa Panzio
description: Set in Balatonkenese, 20 km from Bella Stables and Animal Park and 21 km from Bebo Aquapark, Vadkacsa Panzio offers a restaurant, lake views and free WiFi. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. Guests at the bed and breakfast can enjoy a continental breakfast. Vadkacsa Panzio offers a terrace. Cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby, while a bicycle rental service and a private beach area are also available on site. Tihany Abbey is 35 km from the accommodation, while Museum of Minerals is 26 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 111 km from Vadkacsa Panzio.

name: Barbara Wellness Pension
description: In the most beautiful, lush green area of Keszthely, just 300 metres from the lido on Lake Balaton and 6 km from the spa of Hévíz, you can find the charming Barbara Wellness Pension. Here, the famous Hungarian hospitality meets the most modern wellness facilities including a whirlpool, a swimming pool and a hairdresser - unique for a small guest house in this region. Start every day at the rich breakfast buffet. Half board is offered in cooperation with a close-by restaurant. At the reception of the Barbara Wellness Pension you can also buy coffee, tea, soft drinks an the like.

name: Güns Vendégház
description: Boasting pool with a view, open-air bath and views of mountain, Güns Vendégház is located in Szigliget, 27 km from Thermal Lake Hévíz. Featuring free shuttle service, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. There is a sun terrace and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, dishwasher, a coffee machine, a shower, a hair dryer and a wardrobe. The guest house provides certain rooms that include a safety deposit box, and each room is equipped with a private bathroom and a outdoor furniture. At Güns Vendégház the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and halal options. The accommodation offers a picnic area. The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and free use of bicycles is available at Güns Vendégház. Staff at the guest house are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. Sümeg Castle is 30 km from Güns Vendégház, while Tihany Abbey is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton, 37 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Korona Wellness, Rendezvény és Borszálloda
description: Hotel Korona Eger Wellness and Conference Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Eger, whether exploring or just passing through. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Hotel Korona Eger Wellness and Conference Hotel. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, clothes rack, linens, mirror. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, spa will further enhance your satisfying stay. Hotel Korona Eger Wellness and Conference Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Eger unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Nomad Hotel & Glamping
description: The charming Nomad Hotel & Glamping & Campsite with its outdoor pools and an indoor hot tub is situated at the southern slopes of the Bükk Hills, 10 km from the famous Baroque city of Eger. The Balogh family owns and runs this inviting hotel, which offers you comfortably furnished, stylish rooms of various sizes. Fine home-style cuisine can be enjoyed in the restaurant and the bar is an inviting place for a relaxing drink. The Nomád hotel is also an ideal place small conferences and meetings.

name: Farkasko Vendeghaz
description: Located in Noszvaj, within 12 km of Eger Castle and 13 km of Egri Planetarium and Camera Obscura, Farkaskő Vendégház provides accommodation with a garden and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Guests can make use of the outdoor fireplace or the children's playground, or enjoy views of the mountain and garden. Guest rooms are equipped with an oven, microwave, a coffee machine, a bath, slippers and a wardrobe. All units include a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The guest house offers a terrace. The area is popular for hiking, and bike hire is available at Farkaskő Vendégház. Eger Basilica is 13 km from the accommodation, while Egerszalók Thermal Spring is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Debrecen International, 132 km from Farkaskő Vendégház, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Villa Völgy Wellness & Konferencia
description: Located 1.2 km from the town centre of Eger, Hotel Villa Völgy enjoys a quiet location in the Szépasszony valley. It offers a spa and wellness area, a fitness centre and rooms with minibar and cable TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Guests of the Villa Völgy can enjoy breakfast buffet in the on-site restaurant or a drink in the bar. There, also a wide range of highly rated wines from the Eger wine region is served. Villa Völgy is surrounded by a 20.000 m² garden and features amongst others indoor and outdoor swimming pools, a hot tub, several saunas and a gym. Massages will be provided upon request. Guests can rent bicycles at the property for a surcharge. Parking is possible on site for a surcharge.

name: Szt. Flórián Vendégház
description: Szt. Flórián Vendégház is surrounded by a large green park close to the historic centre of Eger. Featuring free Wi-Fi and a wellness centre, it offers table tennis and tennis and badminton courts. All rooms are decorated in bright colours and provide a TV with satellite channels, fridge, hardwood floors and a private bathroom with a shower. Free parking is also included. The wellness centre comprises an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub and an infrared and Finnish sauna. Guests can relax in the garden with a terrace, playground and barbecue facilities. Eger Castle is 1.5 km away, while Dobó Square, a pedestrian area offering various restaurants, cafés and shops, is at a distance of 2 km. Eger Bus Station is within 1.8 km. Egerszalok Thermal Bath is 10 km from the Szt. Flórián.

name: Sándor Hotel
description: The Sándor Hotel can be found on the Kálvária hill above the historical centre of Pécs, 5 minutes' walk from Széchenyi square. It offers paid garage parking and free Wi-Fi. All rooms in the Sándor Hotel have an en-suite bathroom, cable TV and a minibar. Guests can taste Hungarian cuisine, enjoy the buffet breakfast in the restaurant and unwind in the garden.

name: Hotel Therapia
description: Opened in summer 2014, Hotel Therapia is located in Pécs, offering free WiFi access and air-conditioned rooms with a minibar. Free WiFi access is available. The rooms comprise a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. You can enjoy garden views from the room. At Hotel Therapia you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage. Recreational and wellness facilities, such as sauna, physiotherapy or Nordic walking tours are also available. The property can also provide meals upon request. A private clinic, specialised in discrete private healthcare services can be found 150 metres from the property. The hotel is 1.4 km from UNESCO World Heritage - Cella Septichora Visitor Centre, 1.4 km from Pécs Cathedral and 1.4 km from Mosque of Gázi Kászim Pasha.

name: Hotel Makar Sport & Wellness
description: Hotel Makar Sports & Wellness is located in a quiet, green area, a few minutes' walk from the Medical University of Pecs and 2 km from the historic centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. It comprises a park, sports fields, playgrounds and a car park. Apart from an extensive wellness centre with an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, sauna, steam room, this complex also features tennis and squash courts as well. The rooms are located in the main building, with direct access to the wellness area and the restaurant. Daily buffet breakfast is served at the restaurant. Lunches and dinners are available as well. Hotel Makar is 200 metres away from the bus stop of bus number 30, providing easy connections to the centre.

name: Hunguest Hotel Forrás
description: Hunguest Hotel Forrás in Szeged offers free limitless daily entry to the Napfényfürdő Aquapolis Szeged Spa Centre with adventure pools, 9 indoor and 4 outdoor slides, thermal baths, saunas, a steam bath and a salt cabin. This spa centre is set right next to the property and is reachable through a closed corridor. Free WiFi access is available throughout the hotel. Each accommodation unit comes with a balcony and air conditioning. Some of the accommodation units are equipped with an indoor or outdoor hot tub and several have a fireplace. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. Hunguest Hotel Forrás also houses a bowling alley, a bar, billiard tables, a games room and a beauty area. The centre of Szeged can be reached in a 10-minute walk. The Votive Church is set 1.4 km from the property, while Szeged Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Novotel Szeged
description: Put your bags down in 4-star riverside comfort at Novotel Szeged hotel on the banks of the Tisza, a short walk from the centre. Your airy contemporary room gives you space to stretch out and there are great river and city views from your balcony. Start your day fresh with a delicious buffet breakfast on the river-view terrace at Novotel. The hotel offers rooms with high speed WiFi, restaurant, bar and parking,  suitable  for both leisure and business trips with a modern and calming design.accorhotels.com

name: Illés Hotel
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool with a garden, a hunter-style restaurant with a terrace and serving game dishes, Illés Hotel is 100 metres away from the Tisza riverbank in Szeged. Free Wi-Fi is offered in the entire property. All rooms come with air conditioning, a minibar and a TV. Most of the private bathrooms have a shower, while some have a bathtub. Illés Hotel is 2 km away from the pedestrian area of Szeged and the Votive Church of Szeged. The city is well-linked to Budapest and Belgrade via the E75 motorway.

name: Edenrock Stairs
description: The Edenrock Stairs is located in green surroundings at the Danube River, 27 km from Budapest. The indoor pool and the sauna can be accessed free of charge. All rooms have a balcony, a flat-screen cable TV and feature soundproofed windows and bathrobes. Situated amid a 4000 m² garden at the foot of the Pilis Mountain, you can reach the centre of Budapest within a 30-minute drive from the Gréti guest house. Spa facilities include a Finnish sauna, an infra-red cabin and a wide range of medical and relaxing treatments. Hungarian specialities and international cuisine are served in the restaurant of the Edenrock Stairs.

name: Castle Hotel Grof Degenfeld Superior
description: The Gróf Degenfeld Castle Hotel is situated amidst picturesque surroundings in Tarcal, in the heart of the Tokaj-Hegyalja wine region and welcomes all lovers of great wine and nature. The 4-star hotel is housed in a reconstructed historical mansion in the middle of a 100-hectare vineyard. The rooms are equipped with Empire furniture and luxurious colour-coordinated fabrics. Spend relaxing hours in the noble salon or in the library, dip into the on-site outdoor pool, dine fine in the restaurant and make use of the hotel's exquisite meeting facilities. Guests can also visit the on-site Theresa Chapel for free, built in 1750 as a tribute to Maria Theresa, then Queen of Hungary.

name: Eto Park Hotel Business & Stadium
description: With panoramic views of Győr Stadium, the modern ETO Park Hotel Business & Stadium offers a wellness centre, free WiFi in all areas, as well as free private parking opposite the stadium. A buffet breakfast, Hungarian and international dishes are served at the restaurant. All air-conditioned rooms at ETO Park Hotel Business & Stadium feature an LCD TV, kettle and minibar. Private bathrooms come with a shower and hairdryer. Guests can use the fitness centre on site, or relax in the wellness centre comprising a Finnish sauna and a steam room. The Győr Ice Rink is 100 metres away, while the city centre, Győr Basilica, and Raba Quelle Bath are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Kecskemet Hotel and Conference Center
description: In the Middle of It All. The Four Points by Sheraton Kecskemet Hotel and Conference Center is near the center of this major industrial city between Budapest and Szeged. Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport (BUD) is approximately 35 minutes away via Highway M5. The Place to Meet. Our modern conference venues span 1,400 square meters, including a 380-square meter ballroom. Work out in our fitness center or indulge yourself at the spa, which features saunas, a steam bath, a swimming pool, a hot tub, a relaxation room and massage facilities. Enjoy a great meal at the all-day dining restaurant or grab your favorite drink at the lobby bar. An Uncomplicated Stay. Experience the comforts of our 130 guest rooms and six suites, ranging from 24 to 82 square meters. Fresh, quiet rooms feature a warm, contemporary design and modern amenities.Marriott

name: Central Hotel es Etterem
description: Situated in a quiet part of the centre of Nyíregyháza and the Bujtosi Lake reachable within a 15-minute walk, the 4-star Hotel Central offers en-suite accommodation, a fine restaurant. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and free private parking is possible on site. The attractive appearance of the hotel is highlighted by a number of works of art both inside and outside. The hall is an ideal meeting place and there are separate conference rooms up to 200 people. The on-site restaurant is serving Hungarian cuisine, as well as international dishes.

name: Hunguest Hotel Panorama
description: No description found

name: Hotel Garzon Plaza
description: Hotel Garzon Plaza offers accommodation in Győr. Győr Town Hall is 1.8 km from the property. Free WiFi is featured. Hotel Garzon Plaza also includes an indoor pool. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The accommodation units are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are offered. Győr Basilica is 2 km from Hotel Garzon Plaza. Private parking is possible on site for a surcharge, while parking in the street is available for free.

name: Hotel Kristály Imperial
description: Looking back upon a long tradition in hospitality starting in 1770, Hotel Kristály Imperial is situated in the centre of Tata, close to the English Garden, the Cseke Lake and the Öreg Lake with the Castle. The Esterházy wing houses 10 large superior rooms featuring exclusive design, LCD TVs, and a spa bath. The József wing houses standard rooms including one for disabled guests. The Erzsébet wing is the new part of the hotel with the majority of the standard rooms situated there, including 1 for disabled guests. Wired internet is available in all hotel rooms free of charge. Fine Hungarian and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the elegant restaurant of the Hotel Kristály Imperial. Exclusive events can be accommodated in the Palm Events and Conference Centre, the former palm house in the English Garden. Garage parking under camera surveillance is available free of charge.

name: Piknik Wellness Hotel
description: Set in Siófok, 7.4 km from Bebo Aquapark, Piknik Wellness Hotel offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a tennis court, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. Some units at the property feature a balcony with a garden view. Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. Guests at the resort can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast. Piknik Wellness Hotel offers a spa centre. You can play billiards and table tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking German, English and Hungarian, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Bella Stables and Animal Park is 14 km from Piknik Wellness Hotel, while Museum of Minerals is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hévíz–Balaton Airport, 89 km from the resort.

name: Thermal Hotel Visegrád
description: The Thermal Hotel Visegrád is located in the scenic Danube Bend on the edge of Visegrád, 40 km north of Budapest. It provides accommodation units with air conditioning, as well as spa facilities. The nicely furnished rooms have a balcony and offer views over the park or towards the Danube river. The Danube Restaurant is one of the hotel's highlights, boasting a wonderful view over the Danube Bend and seating up to 220 guests. Various bars and pubs in the Thermal Hotel Visegrád invite you to spend relaxing hours chatting with fellow travellers and enjoying your favourite drinks.

name: Grand Hotel Esztergom
description: Set in Esztergom, 45 km from Margaret Island Japanese Garden, Grand Hotel Esztergom offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a concierge service for guests. The units at the hotel come with a seating area. Guests at Grand Hotel Esztergom can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Speaking German, English, Hungarian and Slovak at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Chain Bridge is 48 km from Grand Hotel Esztergom, while Heroes' Square is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Budapest Ferenc Liszt International Airport, 61 km from the hotel.

name: Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa
description: Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa Superior is located in Bük, in the western corner of the country, in the heart of the thermal region famous for its healing springs. The four-star superior rated hotel is surrounded by a beautiful maintained 18-hole championship golf course and 100 hectares of parkland. Greenfield Hotel offers a unique combination of wellness and golf hotels providing an idyllic ambience. Our interiors have been revitalized and our rooms have a new, modern look. Our spa and sauna world has been renewed, ensuring the ultimate relaxation experience. The Greenfield Hotel Golf & Spa’s the services of our 3500 sqm large exclusive wellness and spa world and cleanse your body and soul. The hotel has one heated outdoor pool and 5 indoor pools - adventure pool, 2 indoor pools filled with our own medicinal water, 20 meter long sport pool and a baby pool with slide and water adventure element. From December 2021 Finnish sauna, bio and light sauna, aroma sauna, salt room with salt sand box, ice fountain, plunge pool, experience shower offer our guests relaxation and pampering. Our beauty salon provides the services of a cosmetics salon. We have also expanded our services to make our guests' stay even more enjoyable, with the creation of our exclusive Spa & Harmony wellness area (with surcharge) and a 10-metre high tower slide, which can be used 365 days a year. And don't forget to have fun while you relax! In the Chill&Fun Entertainment Centre, everyone will find their favourite entertainment, while the Play&Fun playroom for the kids guarantees a playful and fun-filled experience.

name: Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference
description: Just 30 metres from the Aqua-Palace and a 5-minute walk from Hajdúszoboszló’s thermal bath, Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference has a modern spa with an indoor pool, a stylish pool terrace, a gym, and a restaurant. Air conditioning and free WiFi are standard room facilities at Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference. Each room has its own balcony. Flooded with natural light, the indoor pool lies in the centre of the wellness centre. Next to it there is a large hot tub and plenty of lounging space. There are different types of saunas, steam baths and even an ice cave. Hotel Atlantis Medical, Wellness & Conference’s restaurant serves national and international dishes. For a light snack or a drink, there is also a bar. Room service is available.

name: Villa Lux
description: The Hotel Villalux enjoys a quiet location in Heviz and offers you rooms with balcony, cable TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as free parking on site. Supermarkets, restaurants and the Heviz lake are reachable on foot in 5 minutes. A thermal lake is 1.4 km away.

name: Hotel Délibáb
description: The 4-star Hotel Délibáb is located next to the popular Hungarospa Bath, the biggest bath complex in Europe. Hajdúszoboszló city is located at the edge of Hortobágy Puszta and is just 20 km from Debrecen. Wi-Fi is available in all areas of the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV, a minibar and anti-stress bed linen. The private bathroom comes with a shower, bathrobes and a hair-dryer. For an extra charge, guests can access the Bath Complex through the open-air courtyard of the property. Hotel Delibab offers buffet breakfast, half board and 1 à la carte restaurant with modern Hungarian and international dishes. The bar features darts and billiard facilities.

name: Duna Wellness Hotel
description: An indoor pool, several saunas and sun beds can be used at Duna Wellness Hotel. All accommodation looks out onto Baja’s main square, Sugovica River or into the hotel's courtyard. A private bathroom and satellite TV are featured in all units. Several are spacious and have a separate living room and sleeping quarters. Duna Wellness Hotel’s à-la-carte restaurant serves international and regional dishes. These can be enjoyed on the large covered terrace. Wi-Fi and parking are available on site free of charge. A guest computer with internet access can be used in the lobby and bicycles can be rented from the property. The Türr István Museum is 150 metres away and the Déry Garden can be reached on foot in 5 minutes. Horse riding, fishing, hiking and cycling are popular activities in the area.

name: Hotel Három Gúnár
description: Situated in the heart of Kecskemét, the 4-star Hotel Három Gúnár offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and cable TV, just a 2-minute walk from the Katona József Theatre. Facilities include a hot tub. The air-conditioned rooms of Három Gúnár are decorated with wooden furniture and carpeted floors. All rooms have a minibar, a flat screen TV, a work desk as well as coffee and tea making facilities. Free toilettries are offered in the en-suite bathrooms. There is rich buffet breakfast with freshly ground coffee. Három Gúnár Hotel’s restaurant serves a wide selection of traditional Hungarian dishes as well as international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink in the garden or the lobby bar of the Hotel Három Gúnár. The Great Church is only 290 metres from Hotel Három Gúnár, and the Kecskemét Gallery is 300 metres away. The Hotel Három Gúnár is situated 80 km away from the Liszt Ferenc International Airport (BUD). Airport shuttle is offered at extra cost. Private parking garage is available for the visitors.
